entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
